mapper.select:
select oymbSeq , oymbAdminNy , oymbDormancyNy , oymbName , oymbId , oymbPassword , oymbPwdModDate , oymbGenderCd , oymbDob , oymbSavedCd , oymbMarriageCd , oymbMarriageDate , oymbChildenNy , oymbFavoriteColor , oymbRecommenderSeq , oymbEmailConsentNy , oymbSmsConsentNy , oymbPushConsentNy , oymbDesc , oymbDelNy
from oyMember
where 1=1 and oymbDelNy=0
select oymbSeq , oymbName , oymbId , oymbDelNy from oyMember where 1=1 and oymbDelNy = 0
